title: Change signature of set_flush_denormal
body_html:
Currently, set_flush_denormal has the signature in C++:

bool set_flush_denormal(bool on)

(The Python types are the same)

The signature is a bit confusing because both the parameter and return type are bool, and it's easy to ignore the returned value.

We should change the return type to void and issue a warning (perhaps using AT_WARN) when the CPU doesn't support flushing denormals.

body:
Currently, set_flush_denormal has the signature in C++:

```
bool set_flush_denormal(bool on)
```

(The Python types are the same)

The signature is a bit confusing because both the parameter and return type are bool, and it's easy to ignore the returned value.

We should change the return type to `void` and issue a warning (perhaps using `AT_WARN`) when the CPU doesn't support flushing denormals.
